description: This file defines a mock class `ServiceMock` implementing the `WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell` interface, used for unit testing or mocking in a C++ software project. It includes method declarations with Google Mock macros to simulate the behavior of a shell service within the plugin host environment.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the `WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell` interface for unit testing, utilizing Google Mock to simulate the behavior of shell services in the plugin framework.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service mock.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates whether the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported given a uint8_t input.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: SubSystems
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the subsystem interface.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a uint32_t and a JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with two string parameters.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if service runs in background.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason code.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason code.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason code.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns the current reason for a certain state.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Returns a configuration line with a given string parameter.

methods.name: StartMode (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets start mode with a parameter.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernates the service with a reason code.
